#### About Me

I'm [Taq Karim](https://medium.com/@the_taqquikarim). Here's the quick **cliffnotes** on my life:

#### Origin Story
Moved to **America** when I was **5 years old**. Learned english from watching the Smurfs.

Grew up in **Astoria, Queens**. Scraped my knees a lot.

#### Claim to Fame
**Naz** dropped out of my **middle school**, I.S. 204Q.

#### #Humblebrag
Extremely lucky to count myself as an alumnus of **Stuyvesant High School** and **The Cooper Union**. 

#### Goal in Life
Motto of my life: **See a Need, Fill a Need** (Bigweld, *Robots*).

#### What I want to be when I grow up
Become an **author**; write fictional stories and memoirs about life as an immigrant, clever mental math tricks, and the art of pick-up streetball.

#### What I actually do now that I have grown up
One night per week, I don't sleep and instead build or improve on an **classroom tools** that help me **teach more efficiently** or help my **students learn more effectively**.


#### Normalizing Our Backgrounds
---

Let's spend a few minutes doing a quick background check on everyone's knowledge of HTML basics.

We can use this as a way to see how comfortable everyone is with the initial content and if needed, fill in any gaps in understanding as required.

key-deliverable.content:
# Key Deliverable
---

In order to explore the core concepts of this class and achieve our learning objectives, we will recreate the **traditional resume template** for the web.

#### Key Requirements
---

* Template should resemble the typical resume.pdf we all maintain
* Template should use tasteful CSS3 styles to accentuate key peices of information and design principles
* Template should work across all screens including (and specifically) mobile
* Template should be **printer friendly** and take up exactly one page  when printed. 

Here is an **[example](http://resume.taqquikarim.com/)**.

#### Task
---
Please create a simple webpage and mark up your own resume template. Use **only** pure **HTML tags** and do not worry to much about the styles itself. You may use the **[example](http://resume.taqquikarim.com/)** above as reference.

If you do not feel comfortable using your own credentials in this exercise, feel free to make up a persona or use a celebrity (ie: **Mickey Mouse**).
